item.title: Stefany add a quote by Stephenie Meyer
item.description: "He's like a drug for you, Bella." -- Stephenie Meyer

item.title: Stefany add a quote by Mother Teresa
item.description: "If you judge people, you have no time to love them." -- Mother Teresa

item.title: Stefany add a quote by Sheryl Crow
item.description: "It's not having what you want, it's wanting what you have!" -- Sheryl Crow

item.title: Stefany add a quote by John Flanagan
item.description: "People will think what they want to," he said quietly. Never take too much notice of it." -- John Flanagan

item.title: Stefany add a quote by Jane Austen
item.description: "In vain have I struggled. It will not do. My feelings will not be repressed. You must allow me to tell you how ardently I admire and love you." -- Jane Austen

item.title: Stefany add a quote by Jane Austen
item.description: "From all that I can collect by your manner of talking, you must be two of the silliest girls in the country. I have suspected it some time, but I am now convinced." -- Jane Austen

item.title: Stefany add a quote by Jane Austen
item.description: "Life seems but a quick succession of busy nothings." -- Jane Austen

item.title: Stefany add a quote by Suzanne Collins
item.description: "Destroying things is much easier than making them." -- Suzanne Collins

item.title: Stefany add a quote by Suzanne Collins
item.description: "I really can't think about kissing when I've got a rebellion to incite. " -- Suzanne Collins

item.title: Stefany add a quote by Suzanne Collins
item.description: "We had to save you because you're the mockingjay, Katniss," says Plutarch. "While you live, the revolution lives." -- Suzanne Collins

item.title: Stefany add a quote by Patrick Carman
item.description: "It occurred to me then that it was in times of struggle that I found the best parts of myself - courage, loyalty, an unexpected peace - and I always discovered what I needed to break through and go on." -- Patrick Carman

item.title: Stefany add a quote by Patrick Carman
item.description: "If bringing down the wall would require you to fly, you must believe you can fly. Otherwise, when the decisive moment comes, you will surely discover you ahve no wings." -- Patrick Carman

item.title: Stefany add a quote by Patrick Carman
item.description: "The size of your body is just right. The only question is whether you're big enough inside." -- Patrick Carman

item.title: Stefany add a quote by Patrick Carman
item.description: "He has guided my hands in ways I don't always understand, ways that people of this world would scoff at. But there is a purpose for all that I have ever made, even if I don't understand for certain what that purpose is." -- Patrick Carman

item.title: Stefany add a quote by Frank Beddor
Stefany add a quote by Frank Beddor
item.description: "You can't spend so much time in a place and not carry a bit of it inside you." -- Frank Beddor

item.title: Stefany add a quote by Nicholas Sparks
item.description: "I am nothing special, of this I am sure. I am a common man with common thoughts and I've led a common life. There are no monuments dedicated to me and my name will soon be forgotten, but I've loved another with all my heart and soul, and to me, this has always been enough.." -- Nicholas Sparks

item.title: Stefany add a quote by Milan Kundera
item.description: "You can't measure the mutual affection of two human beings by the number of words they exchange." -- Milan Kundera

item.title: Stefany add a quote by George Eliot
item.description: "I like not only to be loved, but also to be told that I am loved. I am not sure that you are of the same mind. But the realm of silence is large enough beyond the grave. This is the world of light and speech, and I shall take leave to tell you that you are very dear." -- George Eliot

item.title: Stefany add a quote by George Eliot
item.description: "What do we live for, if it is not to make life less difficult for each other?" -- George Eliot

item.title: Stefany add a quote by George Eliot
item.description: "Blessed is the man who, having nothing to say, abstains from giving us wordy evidence of the fact." -- George Eliot

item.title: Stefany add a quote by Elizabeth Gilbert
item.description: "Stop wearing your wishbone where your backbone ought to be." -- Elizabeth Gilbert

item.title: Stefany add a quote by Elizabeth Gilbert
item.description: "You need to learn how to select your thoughts just the same way you select your clothes every day. This is a power you can cultivate. If you want to control things in your life so bad, work on the mind. That's the only thing you should be trying to control." -- Elizabeth Gilbert

item.title: Stefany add a quote by Elizabeth Gilbert
item.description: "You are, after all, what you think. Your emotions are the slaves to your thoughts, and you are the slave to your emotions." -- Elizabeth Gilbert

item.title: Stefany add a quote by Elizabeth Gilbert
item.description: "Do not apologize for crying. Without this emotion, we are only robots." -- Elizabeth Gilbert

item.title: Stefany add a quote by Elizabeth Gilbert
item.description: "As smoking is to the lungs, so is resentment to the soul; even one puff is bad for you." -- Elizabeth Gilbert

item.title: Stefany add a quote by Elizabeth Gilbert
item.description: "Dear me, how I love a library." -- Elizabeth Gilbert

item.title: Stefany add a quote by Elizabeth Gilbert
item.description: "There is a reason they call God a presence - because God is right here, right now. In the present is the only place to find Him, and now is the only time." -- Elizabeth Gilbert

item.title: Stefany add a quote by Elizabeth Gilbert
item.description: "People think a soul mate is your perfect fit, and that's what everyone wants. But a true soul mate is a mirror, the person who shows you everything that is holding you back, the person who brings you to your own attention so you can change your life." -- Elizabeth Gilbert
